site_name: 25-29 Carnbrook Road and Garages to Rear, Kidbrooke, London, SE3 8AD
description: Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 2 - Materials, Condition 8 - Delivery and Servicing Plan, Condition 12 - Wheelchair Accessible Dwellings,Condition 15 -Refuse and Recycling, including Bulky Waste, condition 17 (Green/Brown Roofs), condition 18 (Ecological Assessment), condition 19 parts a, b and c Energy and Water effeicency, condition 20 (Carbon Emission Reduction), condition 21 (Renewable Energy), condition 22 (Renewable Energy Installation), condition 25 (Air Quality Report) and condition 30 parts a and b  (Acoustic Report) of planning permission dated 23/04/2019 (Ref:19/0544/MA).
